players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and found out she's the mafioso. We need to vote her out to protect the town."
You: "That's ridiculous, Bob! I didn't do anything. Why are you accusing me out of the blue? Maybe you're trying to mislead us."
Diana: "I think Charlie's death was suspicious. Let's investigate him tonight to uncover the truth."
You: "I still think Bob is lying to protect himself. Let's vote him out instead."
Bob: "I still stand by my investigation—Alice is the mafioso. We can't afford to waste time; vote her out to save the town."
Diana: "I suggest we investigate Charlie's death first. It seems more suspicious than Alice being a mafioso. Let's gather evidence and make an informed decision before taking action against anyone."
